location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Photograph of a flatbed truck. Photographer unknown.

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:57 mm x 60 mmCondition:There are rust marks in the top-right corner of the photograph, caused by a paperclip.Foliation:The photograph bears two numbers: a circled 55 and an uncircled 137. The folio number that should be used for referencing purposes is on the plastic sleeve in which the photograph is held (47).Process:Silver-gelatin

mods.abstract: Subject Matter:View of a six-wheel flatbed truck, manufactured by the Autocar Company, USA, and used by the California Arabian Standard Oil Company at Dhahran, Saudi Arabia. The truck is stationary and stands on a sandy surface.
